summary.span: 支持循环访问 对象并读取其各个字符。

span.span: Supports iterating over a object and reading its individual characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对引用的 对象中的字符的只读访问。A provides read-only access to the characters in a referenced object. 例如，Microsoft Visual Basic 和C#编程语言的 `foreach` 语句，这些语言循环访问集合的元素，从 对象检索 ，以便循环访问该对象中的字符。For example, the `foreach` statement of the Microsoft Visual Basic and C# programming languages, which iterates through the elements of a collection, retrieves a from a object in order to iterate through the characters in that object. > [!IMPORTANT] > `CharEnumerator` 类枚举单个16位 实例。The `CharEnumerator` class enumerates individual 16-bit instances. 它不会将 graphemes （即，后跟一个或多个 combiding 字符的字符）或代理项对（即 Unicode 基本多语言平面之外的字符）视为单个字符。It does not consider graphemes (that is, a character followed by one or more combiding characters) or surrogate pairs (that is, characters outside the Unicode Basic Multilingual Plane) as single characters. 对于将这些类型的字符作为单个单元进行处理的枚举数，请使用 类。For an enumerator that handles these types of characters as a single unit, use the class. 没有公共构造函数。There is no public constructor for . 相反，请调用 对象的 方法来获取初始化为引用该字符串的 。Instead, call a object's method to obtain a that is initialized to reference the string. 维护 引用字符串中字符的内部索引。A maintains an internal index to the characters in the string the references. 当索引引用字符串中第一个字符之前或最后一个字符之后的字符位置时，该索引的状态无效，在引用字符串中的字符时有效。The state of the index is invalid when it references a character position logically before the first character or after the last character in the string, and valid when it references a character within the string. 索引初始化为逻辑上位于第一个字符之前的位置，并在迭代完成后设置为最后一个字符之后的位置。The index is initialized to a position logically before the first character, and is set to a position after the last character when the iteration is complete. 如果尝试在索引无效时访问字符，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if you attempt to access a character while the index is invalid. 方法将索引递增一，因此依次访问第一个和后面的字符。The method increments the index by one, so the first and subsequent characters are accessed in turn. 方法将索引设置为逻辑上位于第一个字符之前的位置。The method sets the index to a position logically before the first character. 属性检索索引当前引用的字符。The property retrieves the character currently referenced by index. 方法创建 的副本。The method creates a copy of the . > [!NOTE] > 一个或多个线程之间 的多个独立实例可以访问 的单个实例。Several independent instances of across one or more threads can have access to a single instance of . 实现此类以支持 接口。This class is implemented to support the interface. 有关使用枚举器的详细信息，请参阅 主题。For more information regarding the use of an enumerator, see the topic. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 类来枚举字符串中的单个字符。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它通过调用 方法实例化 对象，通过调用 方法从一个字符移动到下一个字符，并通过检索 属性的值显示当前字符。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 但请注意，可以使用 `foreach` （在中C#）或 `For Each` （在 Visual Basic 中）以更直观的方式执行相同的操作，如下面的示例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Clone() cil managed
abstract member Clone : unit -> obj override this.Clone : unit -> obj

summary.span: 创建当前 对象的副本。

span.span: Creates a copy of the current object.
An that is a copy of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值是此实例的 及其当前状态的副本。The return value is a copy of this instance of and its current state. 这对于在循环访问 对象时保存状态很有用。This is useful for saving your state while iterating through a object. 例如，假设应用程序使用 的原始实例来循环访问 中的每个字符。For example, suppose your application uses an original instance of to iterate through each character in a . 当遇到一些唯一字符时，应用程序会暂停处理并调用 方法。When some unique character is encountered, your application pauses processing and invokes the method. 实际上，这会将 对象的索引保存在 中。In effect, this saves the object's index in the . 应用程序使用克隆导航到 `String` 的另一部分，以执行一些辅助处理。Your application uses the clone to navigate to another part of the `String` to perform some auxiliary processing. 此导航的副作用是克隆无法跟踪处理停止的位置。The side-effect of this navigation is the clone loses track of the position where processing stopped. 但是，当辅助处理完成后，应用程序会丢弃克隆，并使用原始 实例继续处理最初处理停止的 。However, when the auxiliary processing is complete, your application discards the clone and uses the original instance to resume working on the where the original processing stopped. > [!NOTE] > 实现此方法是为了支持 接口。This method is implemented to support the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As Char
public: property char Current { char get(); };

summary.span: 获取由此 对象枚举的字符串中当前引用的字符。

span.span: Gets the currently referenced character in the string enumerated by this object.

value.span: 当前由此 对象引用的 Unicode 字符。

span.span: The Unicode character currently referenced by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维护枚举字符串的内部索引， 属性返回索引当前引用的字符。The class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the property returns the character that is currently referenced by the index. 仅当索引有效时才应调用此属性;否则，将引发异常。This property should be invoked only when the index is valid; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 索引对于空字符串（""）始终无效。The index is always invalid for an empty string (""). 调用 或 方法后，该索引也无效。The index is also invalid after the or method is called. 在调用这些方法之一后，调用 方法，将索引调整为枚举字符串中的第一个字符。After either of these methods is called, invoke the method to adjust the index to the first character in the enumerated string. 每当 方法返回 `true`时，索引都有效。The index is valid whenever the method returns `true`. 不会移动索引，并且在调用 、或 之前，对 的连续调用返回相同的字符。 does not move the index, and consecutive calls to return the same character until , , or is called. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 类来枚举字符串中的单个字符。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它通过调用 方法实例化 对象，通过调用 方法从一个字符移动到下一个字符，并通过检索 属性的值显示当前字符。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 但请注意，可以使用 `foreach` （在中C#）或 `For Each` （在 Visual Basic 中）以更直观的方式执行相同的操作，如下面的示例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 该索引无效；即它位于枚举字符串的第一个字符之前或最后一个字符之后。

span.span: The index is invalid; that is, it is before the first or after the last character of the enumerated string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed
abstract member MoveNext : unit -> bool override this.MoveNext : unit -> bool

summary.span: 递增当前 对象的内部索引使其指向枚举的字符串的下一个字符。

span.span: Increments the internal index of the current object to the next character of the enumerated string.

returns.span: 如果索引递增成功并且在枚举字符串内，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the index is successfully incremented and within the enumerated string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维护枚举字符串的内部索引， 方法将索引递增1。The class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the method increments the index by one. 调用 或 将当前字符位置递增到枚举字符串中的第一个字符后，调用 。Call after calling or to increment the current character position to the first character in the enumerated string. 检查返回值是否 `true` 以确定当前字符位置是否有效。Check that the return value is `true` to determine that the current character position is valid. 如果索引已超过枚举字符串的最后一个字符，则不会更改索引，并返回 `false`。If the index is already beyond the last character of the enumerated string, the index is not changed and `false` is returned. 请注意，如果枚举的字符串为空（""），则 的状态始终无效。Notice that if the enumerated string is empty (""), the state of the is always invalid. 这是因为 的内部索引最初早于枚举字符串的第一个字符，因此无效。This is because the internal index for the is initially before the first character of the enumerated string and is therefore invalid. 以逻辑方式将索引设置为枚举字符串的最后一个（不存在）字符之后，这也是无效的。 logically sets the index after the last (nonexistent) character of the enumerated string which is also invalid. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 类来枚举字符串中的单个字符。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它通过调用 方法实例化 对象，通过调用 方法从一个字符移动到下一个字符，并通过检索 属性的值显示当前字符。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 但请注意，可以使用 `foreach` （在中C#）或 `For Each` （在 Visual Basic 中）以更直观的方式执行相同的操作，如下面的示例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 将索引初始化为逻辑上位于枚举字符串的第一个字符之前的位置。

span.span: Initializes the index to a position logically before the first character of the enumerated string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维护枚举字符串的内部索引， 方法将索引设置为无效状态。The class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the method sets the index to the invalid state.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property Current As Object Implements IEnumerator.Current

summary.span: 获取由此 对象枚举的字符串中当前引用的字符。

span.span: Gets the currently referenced character in the string enumerated by this object.

summary.span: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 。

span.span: For a description of this member, see .

value.span: 当前由此 对象引用的已装箱 Unicode 字符。

span.span: The boxed Unicode character currently referenced by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed
abstract member System.IDisposable.Dispose : unit -> unit override this.System.IDisposable.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类完成后，请调用 IDisposable。Call IDisposable.Dispose when you are finished using the class. 方法使 类处于不可用状态。The method leaves the class in an unusable state. 调用之后，必须释放对 类的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 类占用的内存。After calling it, you must release all references to the class so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the class was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 在释放对 类的最后一个引用之前，请始终调用 IDisposable。Always call IDisposable.Dispose before you release your last reference to the class. 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.
